sideQuests:QST_Frac_TaigaE_DropGift_Zala.description: I found an old diary detailing the various travels and sales of a merchant. Zalan Coste in Margrave may want to see this.

sideQuests:QST_Frac_TaigaE_DropGift_Zala.description: I found a wooden figure of a knight. Zalan Coste in Margrave may be interested in this.

sideQuests:QST_Frac_TaigaW_RareHarvest_H.description: I found an odd flower while harvesting herbs. The Kyovashad Alchemist, Veroka, may want to see it.

sideQuests:QST_Frac_TundraN_Motes_Skelet.description: I found a cache infused with powerful magic. I must collect spirit anima to lay the dead to rest and open the cache.

sideQuests:QST_Frac_TundraN_SecretEmote_.name: Secret of the Spring
sideQuests:QST_Frac_TundraN_SecretEmote_.description: A crumpled note bears a cryptic message.

sideQuests:QST_Frac_Tutorial_Emote@-91.9.name: Raising Spirits

sideQuests:QST_Frac_Woodsman@-106.9414,1.description: Find the weapon of a local legend.

sideQuests:QST_Hawe_Bog_Kres_03@-116.309.name: Unearthed Regrets
sideQuests:QST_Hawe_Bog_Kres_03@-116.309.description: Kres is pained with the memories of his past actions.

sideQuests:QST_Hawe_Coast_DeadintheWater.description: A Backwater resident in need offers a glimpse into the harsh realities of daily life.

sideQuests:QST_Hawe_Coast_DebtRepaid@-15.description: Help a woman square away a debt she owes, before her ship leaves Backwater.

sideQuests:QST_Hawe_Coast_DropGift_Lyndo.name: Drink to the Past
sideQuests:QST_Hawe_Coast_DropGift_Lyndo.description: I should see if Lyndon is interested in sharing a drink with me, as Kingsport ale is finer than the usual swill found in Backwater.

sideQuests:QST_Hawe_Coast_Lyndon_01@-151.description: Lyndon needs some muscle to ensure a trade deal goes smoothly.

sideQuests:QST_Hawe_Coast_Lyndon_02@-151.description: Lyndon has a foolproof plan to find the rat in Backwater.

sideQuests:QST_Hawe_Coast_NecroticResear.description: Help Gulyas with her Nangari research.

sideQuests:QST_Hawe_Coast_PoisonedHearts.description: A young girl with burgeoning magic power is taken in by a swamp witch.

sideQuests:QST_Hawe_Coast_TheGreaterGood.description: Recover Backwater's stolen property from the bandits.

sideQuests:QST_Hawe_Delta_Zurke_01@-133..description: An unpaid debt needs to be collected.

sideQuests:QST_Hawe_Delta_Zurke_02@-133..name: Perceived Threat
sideQuests:QST_Hawe_Delta_Zurke_02@-133..description: A growing sickness threatens the swamp.

sideQuests:QST_Hawe_Marsh_DropGift_Timue.description: I found a doll that strongly resembles Timue. I should take it to her, just in case it is some form of witchcraft.

sideQuests:QST_Hawe_Verge_S05_DesperateR.description: A strange outbreak in Wejinhani has left the Elders with more questions than answers.

sideQuests:QST_Kehj_LowDesert_RareHarves.description: I found a strange mushroom while gathering herbs. Veroka, the alchemist in Kyovashad, may be interested in this.

sideQuests:QST_Kehj_LowDesert_TideComesI.description: A man buried in the sand. A family slated for execution.

sideQuests:QST_Kehj_LowDesert_ZakarumsPl.name: Zakarum's Plight
sideQuests:QST_Kehj_LowDesert_ZakarumsPl.description: An exhausted Zakarum novitiate wilts from thirst.

sideQuests:QST_Kehj_Oasis_Armor_01@-123..description: An ill-fated expedition has left Asa with a difficult responsibility.

sideQuests:QST_Kehj_Oasis_GeaKulRefugees.description: A traveling group has met an unfortunate fate while traveling to Dahlgur.

sideQuests:QST_Kehj_Oasis_LonelyWolf_02@.description: The Iron Wolves' water supply has been poisoned.

sideQuests:QST_Kehj_Oasis_LonelyWolf_03@.description: Asa and Dawood have a new lead on the bandits operating around the oasis.

sideQuests:QST_Kehj_Penitent_01@-135.765.description: Aid a mysterious armed man and the group of refugees fleeing Caldeum.

sideQuests:QST_Kehj_Penitent_02@-146.471.description: The mysterious Edgar suggested I find him in Gea Kul.

sideQuests:QST_Kehj_Penitent_03@-145.427.name: Justice Delayed
sideQuests:QST_Kehj_Penitent_03@-145.427.description: Edgar needs help at the Caldeum overlook.

sideQuests:QST_Kehj_Penitent_04@-139.022.description: Edgar's former captain must be stopped.

sideQuests:QST_Kehj_Ridge_FetchMinor_04@.description: Stranded refugees are accosted by demons.

sideQuests:QST_Kehj_Ridge_FetchMinor_05@.description: After the Cathedral’s purge on Tarsarak, blood will have blood.

sideQuests:QST_Kehj_Ridge_PayDue@-132.15.description: A destitute miner seeks a lost lockbox.

sideQuests:QST_Kehj_Ridge_TracesofIron@-.description: A man wants a debt repaid to the Iron Wolves.

sideQuests:QST_Kehj_TriuneRitualMain@-12.name: The Way of the Three
sideQuests:QST_Kehj_TriuneRitualMain@-12.description: Lighting these fires has unlocked a strange altar.

sideQuests:QST_Kehj_Zakarum_FetchMinor_0.name: Butchers of the North
sideQuests:QST_Kehj_Zakarum_FetchMinor_0.description: The roads outside the Zakarum Chapel are overrun with cannibals.

sideQuests:QST_Mount_Unlock@-93.93452,12.name: Mount: Donan's Favor
sideQuests:QST_Mount_Unlock@-93.93452,12.description: Donan has offered to call in a favor with the stable master in Kyovashad to provide me with a horse.

sideQuests:QST_S01_Main_01_Frac@-93.2292.name: Burning from Within
sideQuests:QST_S01_Main_01_Frac@-93.2292.description: I overheard a villager in Kyovashad raving about "corruption.” I should ask him what happened.

sideQuests:QST_S01_Main_02_Step_01@-76.3.name: A Plague of Hatred
sideQuests:QST_S01_Main_02_Step_01@-76.3.description: Cormond is heading to the ruins of Orbei Monastery in the Dry Steppes. He claims a cure for the Malignant may lie within. We shall see.

sideQuests:QST_S01_Main_02_Step_02@-76.3.name: Holding Back the Flood
sideQuests:QST_S01_Main_02_Step_02@-76.3.description:
I have cleared the Malignant tunnels in Dry Steppes for now.Cormond’s search for a cure continues. 

I should continue fighting the Malignant and build strength for whatever comes next.

sideQuests:QST_S01_Main_02_Step_03@-78.7.name: Answers in the Ashes
sideQuests:QST_S01_Main_02_Step_03@-78.7.description: I returned to the wagon but Cormond and his horse have gone. It seems he’s left me a note...

sideQuests:QST_S01_Main_03_Hawe_01@-144..name: A Prayer for Salvation
sideQuests:QST_S01_Main_03_Hawe_01@-144..description: Cormond confessed that he created the Malignant during his attempt to cleanse his mentor, Varshan. Cormond remains determined to find a cure somewhere in Hawezar. He can't do it alone.

sideQuests:QST_S01_Main_03_Hawe_01_LB@-1.name: Hope’s Guardian
sideQuests:QST_S01_Main_03_Hawe_01_LB@-1.description: I have given the documents to Cormond but he needs time to study them. I should fend off the Malignant until he can find where the cages were made.

sideQuests:QST_S01_Main_03_Hawe_02@-132..name: Ruins of the Faith
sideQuests:QST_S01_Main_03_Hawe_02@-132..description: Cormond should have learned something from the documents by now. I should check on him near Zarbinzet.

sideQuests:QST_S01_Main_04_Frac_01@-85.3.name: The Cold Hard Truth
sideQuests:QST_S01_Main_04_Frac_01@-85.3.description: We have what we need to capture Varshan. It will stop the Malignant but it will end Varshan's life. I should meet Cormond at Velkhova to begin the final confrontation.

sideQuests:QST_S01_Main_04_Frac_02@-84.9.name: A Merciful Fate
sideQuests:QST_S01_Main_04_Frac_02@-84.9.description: Varshan’s corruption is captured. His life is ended, but will the Malignant die with him? I should find Cormond by his wagon.

sideQuests:QST_Scos_Blycroft_01@-55.6140.name: Fields of Ruin
sideQuests:QST_Scos_Blycroft_01@-55.6140.description: Help Farmer Phelan protect Blycroft from the khazra.

sideQuests:QST_Scos_Braestaig_FetchMinor.name: Stolen Artifice
sideQuests:QST_Scos_Braestaig_FetchMinor.description: A seemingly petty theft has put innocent lives at risk.

sideQuests:QST_Scos_Cerrigar_Downs_Bread.name: What Ails Thee
sideQuests:QST_Scos_Cerrigar_Downs_Bread.description: A young man worries about the family he left behind.

sideQuests:QST_Scos_Cerrigar_FetchMinor_.name: The Fledgling Merchant
sideQuests:QST_Scos_Cerrigar_FetchMinor_.description: A boy in Cerrigar needs help earning a living.

sideQuests:QST_Scos_Cerrigar_FetchMinor_.name: Blood of Brigands
sideQuests:QST_Scos_Cerrigar_FetchMinor_.description: The glenfolk will pay anyone willing to keep the roads safe.

sideQuests:QST_Scos_Coast_ASoddenPact@-3.description: A tangled fate returns to a cursed shore.

sideQuests:QST_Scos_Coast_Motes_Drowned@.description: In order to open the warded vessel that I found, I must slay drowned on the Cursed Scarps of Scosglen for their death anima.

sideQuests:QST_Scos_Coast_WhispersfromBe.name: Whispers from Below
